5 hours ago, vardicd said:

As far as the current build goes, I've been playing with it for a while now, and i've not run into any further issues, nor technical problems. Nothing I have been able to repeat anyway, couple of one off weird things that I think were just KSP being KSP. the Bureaucracy mod disappearing out of my save, when deleting another save, and needing to restart KSP, being one. I think this build is solid for a proper release, unless you've got something going on your end I don't know about.

Nah, I think it's ready. I'm almost tempted to let it sit until 1.9 comes out now as we know it's close, but I have other things I want to move onto. I'm going to let it sit overnight just in case, I'm not going to get a massive amount of time after work today, and doing a release, getting CKAN sorted etc, all takes time. I will probably release around about Saturday afternoon (GMT).

Now I just need to decide what to do about Monthly Budgets, do I lock the thread, or put it up for adoption.

Edited January 24, 2020 by severedsolo

24 minutes ago, severedsolo said:

now I just need to decide what to do about Monthly Budgets, do I lock the thread, or put it up for adoption.

I mean in all honesty, if you're not going to maintain it, I generally prefer when mod authors leave them up for adoption, instead of letting them die. I realize in this case, this mod is basically monthly budgets 2, as all the basic functionality is still there, with extras, but you never know there might be people that still want the old version with out all the extras. There are a lot of old mods that i use to use that died, because the mod authors left and no one could pick them up and keep them going, and while there are "better" mods that may do the same or similar things, I still miss those old mods, and would use them if they were still around.
Yeah, plus it's there for backward compatibility for older KSP setups. Plenty of people in 1.7.3, for instance.

Houston we have a release

Thank you for all the feedback and testing, I'm going to request this thread is locked, please take all discussion to the release thread.
Thread locked per OP request.
